column2: "Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE
column3: hom mbɔ ne dzin; Hom mma wonhu dza ɔyɛ wɔ aman mu."

column2: "Hom ntow ndwom mma no
column3: hom ntow ayɛyindwom mma no; Hom nka n’anwanwa ndwuma nyina ho asɛm."

column2: "Hom nhyehyɛ homho wɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no mu: Wɔmma hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE no hɔn akoma ndzi ehurusi."
"Hom nhwehwɛ EWURADZE na n’ahoɔdzen; Hom nhwehwɛ n’enyim daa."
"Hom nkaa n’anwanwa ndwuma a ɔayɛ; N’ahobowdze na n’ano ntsɛmbu;"
"Hom n’akowaa Abraham n’asefo
column3: Hom Jakob mba

column2: "Ɔno nye EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn
column3: N’atsɛmbu wɔ asaase nyinara mu."

column2: "Ɔakaa n’ahyɛmu no daa
column3: Asɛm a ɔhyɛe maa mbasantsen pem no;"

column2: "Ahyɛmu a ɔnye Abraham dzii no
column3: Na ne ntam a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Isaak no;"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ no dzen maa Jakob dɛ ahyɛdze
column3: Dze maa Israel dɛ daa ahyɛmu:"

column2: "Dɛ
column3: Ɔwo na medze Keenan asaase bɛma wo

column2: "Ber a hɔn ano yɛ nyimpa kumaabi; Na mpo wɔyɛ ahɔho wɔ Keenan asaase do no."
"Wɔnantsenantsewee fi ɔman mu kɔr ɔman mu
column3: Wofi ahenman kor mu kɔr ɔman kor so mu."

column2: "Ɔamma nyimpa biara kwan ma ɔannyɛ hɔn bɔn; Nyew
column3: otwuuw ahemfo enyim wɔ hɔn ntsi."

column2: "Dɛ
column3: mma hom nnka mo nkorɔfo a wɔasera hɔn no
column4: Na mma hom nnyɛ mo nkɔnhyɛfo bɔn bi."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ ɔkɔm baa asaase no do; Obubuu edziban dua no nyina."
"Ɔsomaa nyimpa bi dzii hɔn enyim; Josef a wɔtɔɔn no kɛyɛɛ akowaa no:"
"Womiaa n’anan hyɛɛ mpokyerɛ mu; Wɔdze no montaan dadze nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu:"
"Kodur aber a n’asɛm baa mu; EWURADZE n’asɛm saan no ho."
"Ɔhen somae ma wɔkɛsaan no; Mekyerɛ aman do ɔhwɛfo no
column3: ma okegyaa no."

column2: "Ɔyɛɛ no ne fi do ɔpanyin
column3: Na n’ahodze nyinara do ɔhwɛfo:"

column2: "Dɛ ɔnkyekyer n’asafohemfo dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ
column3: Na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ n’apamfo nyansa."

column2: "Nna Israel so baa Egypt; Na Jakob kɛyɛɛ hɔho wɔ Ham asaase do."
"Na EWURADZE maa ne man dɔɔr kɛse
column3: Na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ dzen kyɛɛn hɔn atamfo."

column2: "Ɔdaan hɔn akoma ma wokyiir ne man
column3: Dɛ wɔnye no nkowaa ndzi no ndaadaa mu."

column2: "Afei EWURADZE somaa n’akowaa Moses
column3: Ɔnye Aaron a ɔsaan mu yii no no."

column2: "Wɔyɛɛ Nyankopɔn ne nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse
column3: Na n’anwanwadze wɔ Ham asaase do."

column2: "Ɔsomaa sum ma ɔhyɛɛ asaase no sum; Naaso wɔtseew etua wɔ ne nsɛm do."
"Ɔdandaan hɔn esuesu bɔgya
column3: Na okunkum no mu nam
column6: Wɔ hɔn ahemfo mpia mu mpo."

column2: "Ɔkasae ma nwansema na dwuw boboebo bae
column3: Wɔpetsee ɔman no mu nyinara."

column2: "Ɔdze ɔsorbo yɛɛ hɔn nsutɔree
column3: Na ogyaframee baa hɔn asaase do."

column2: "Obubuu hɔn wenyinndua na hɔn adɔmbandua so;"
"Na obubuu hɔn ahe do ndua. Ɔkasae
column3: na mbɛbɛw bae
column4: Mbɛbɛw a hɔn dodow nnyi ano."

column2: "Na wodzii efuw a ɔwɔ hɔn asaase do nyinara
column3: Na wodzii hɔn asaase do ekuadze nyinara."

column2: "Ɔbobɔɔ hɔn asaase do mbakan nyinara so
column3: Hɔn ahoɔdzen nyinara ahyɛse no."

column2: "Na afei ɔdze dwetɛ na sika dze hɔn fiir edzi kɔree: Nna nyimpa a ɔyɛ mberɛw kor mpo nnyi n’ebusuakuw no mu."
"Wosii mu kɔree no
column3: Egypt enyi gyee; Osiandɛ nna hɔn ho hu atɔ hɔn do."

column2: "Ɔtserɛɛw mununkum mu yɛɛ akatado; Na ogya dɛ ɔmma kan anadwe."
"Wobisae
column3: na ɔdze Nkokɔhwerɛw bae
column4: Na ɔdze sor edziban mee hɔn."

column2: "Obuee ɔbotan mu
column3: na esu tuei; Wɔpemee wɔ wewewdo dɛ esutsen."

column2: "Na ɔkaa n’asɛm krɔnkrɔn no
column3: Na n’akowaa Abraham."

column2: "Na ɔdze ehurusi yii ne man fiir edzi
column3: Na hɔn a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn no wɔ adwontow mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze amanaman asaase maa hɔn; Na wɔfaa aman hɔn edwumadze yɛɛ hɔndze:"
"Ma woeesie n’ahyɛdze
column3: Na woeedzi ne mbra do. Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
